 Deduction from Theorem 19.9 of [Margaris] p. 89.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 18-Jun-2018.)
statement:
exlimd.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
exlimd.2 $e |- F/ x ch $.
exlimd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
exlimd $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x ps -> ch ) ) $.
